DOC.brief_summary: The goal research study learn diet exercise habit , emotion , social support life woman ovarian cancer .
DOC.brief_title: Biobehavioral Sociodemographic Characteristics Long Term Survivors Ovarian Cancer
DOC.detailed_description: Study Participation : If agree take part study , fill questionnaire , complete interview , information collect medical record . For questionnaire , answer question quality life , mood , social support , stress , diet , lifestyle , demographic information ( age race ) . The questionnaire take 60-90 minute complete . If prefer fill questionnaire online , 3 separate email send email address . Each email contain separate link ( first link send MD Anderson , second University Arizona diet question , third University California Los Angeles [ UCLA ] stress question ) . You also ask measure waist hip measure tape record measurement questionnaire . If prefer fill questionnaire paper format , mail back research staff . However , stress question need do phone . A trained interviewer ask question amount stress may past . It take 25-30 minute complete interview . If long-term survivor , interview phone ask opinion factor may contribute survival . This interview take 45 minute hour audio-recorded . Your name identify information record . Information collect medical record include status disease , disease gotten bad , treatment receive , side effect may . This information help researcher learn specific treatment may affect patient . If already enrol protocol tumor tissue collect future analysis , information gather study use together data collect study learn behavioral factor relate tumor tissue test result . Length Study : Your study participation complete questionnaire interview . Other Information : Before information record , ask permission . The tape record do member study staff . Your audiotape give code number . No identify information ( name medical record number ) record audiotape . This investigational study . Up 240 participant enrol multicenter study . Up 120 take part MD Anderson .
DOC.criteria: 1 . For longterm survivor group : alive least seven year postdiagnosis . 2 . At least 18 year age . 3 . Can speak read English . 4. diagnosed stage IIIIV ovarian , peritoneal fallopian tube cancer 1 . Are hospice refer hospice within next 36 week . 2 . Are oriented time , person , place .
